title: Add introduction page with 'How it works?' link

requirements.text: Add a semi-transparent 'How it works? (运作规则)' text link below the ENTER button on the splash screen that opens an introduction modal when clicked

quotes: 在那个"ENTER"按钮下方，加一行半透明的小字："How it works?（运作规则）"

acceptanceCriteria: Link appears below ENTER button with reduced opacity styling
Clicking the link opens the introduction modal
Link text displays 'How it works? (运作规则)' in the current language

requirements.text: Create an introduction modal component that displays the complete Grit Bounty concept and rules in a scrollable format with proper typography hierarchy and sections

quotes: 点击以后出现《Grit Bounty》软件介绍：将"如果当初"变为现实

acceptanceCriteria: Modal displays all five sections with clear visual hierarchy
Content is scrollable if it exceeds viewport height
Modal can be closed via close button or clicking outside
Sections are properly formatted with headings, bullet points, and emphasis

requirements.text: Add translation keys for the complete introduction content in all three supported languages (English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese) covering: Core Mission, Use Cases (daily routines, health, exercise, social activities, enterprise promotion), Bounty Mechanism (task publishing with ICP deposit, crowdfunding additions, warrior acceptance with deposit), Settlement Rules (success payout, task unclaimed refund, default forfeit, platform fees of 6%), and Warrior Credit System (50% initial deposit reducing 3% per successful quest to minimum 2%, reset to 50% on default)

quotes: 一、 我们的核心使命
二、 无论你的想法多么奇特
三、 悬赏与运作机制
四、 结算与费用说明
五、 勇士信用减免系统

acceptanceCriteria: All introduction sections have translation keys in frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts
English translation accurately conveys the platform concept
Simplified Chinese matches the provided content exactly
Traditional Chinese is properly converted from Simplified Chinese
Examples include: waking at 5am, vegetarian diet, vitamin C intake, 10km running, making 3 friends daily, enterprise app promotion

constraints: Do not modify the authentication flow or backend functionality
Maintain the existing dark theme design system with OKLCH colors
Keep the modal component consistent with existing dialog patterns (similar to AddToPotDialog, DailyCheckIn dialogs)
Do not implement actual ICP payment functionality - this is display-only content
nonGoals: Implementing ICP payment integration or Ledger Canister connections
Adding new backend endpoints or data models
Modifying the main application navigation or layout structure
